Detailed Description

template<typename EqualVarRef1, typename EqualVarRef2, typename BoolVarRef>
struct ReifiedEqualConstraint< EqualVarRef1, EqualVarRef2, BoolVarRef >

(var1 = var2) = var3

constraints;eq Description Constrain two variables to take equal values. constraints;eq Example eq(x0,x1) constraints;eq Notes Achieves bounds consistency. constraints;eq Reference help constraints minuseq constraints;minuseq Description Constraint

minuseq(x,y)

ensures that x=-y. constraints;minuseq Reference help constraints eq constraints;diseq Description Constrain two variables to take different values. constraints;diseq Notes Achieves arc consistency. constraints;diseq Example diseq(v0,v1)

virtual triggerCollection ReifiedEqualConstraint< EqualVarRef1, EqualVarRef2, BoolVarRef >::setup_internal (  )  [inline, virtual]

Gets all the triggers a constraint wants to set up.

This function shouldn't do any propagation. That is full_propagate's job.

Reimplemented from AbstractConstraint.
